Text: Welcome, playtesters, to the new Hack experience! All of us here at Endless are excited to have you here, and look forward to seeing your responses on the survey at the end of the playtest time. Go have fun and check out the world of Hack!
#spacelife
+countesslovelace whats the digital version of a flea collar?
+_getriled I’d think it’s an antivirus program. Why?
+countesslovelace uhhhhh no reason
+countesslovelace ok I let Felix into my home directory and he totally trashed all my files… and there’s weird ones in here now that I don’t remember saving
+_getriled Oh dear… I think you should ask Saniel if there’s anything he can do. +srowe1822 - Any ideas?
+countesslovelace aaaaa no don’t he TOLD me not to let Felix in
+_getriled The USB key with my strongest antivirals is already in your school mailbox.
+srowe1822 thanks
+_getriled No need to thank me… although if you were to free up tomorrow evening, I have quite a few back-issues of the Journal of Computational Linguistics that could use sorting and shelving.
+_getriled don’t tell Saniel, I’ll bring cookies.
+srowe1822 tomorrow evening it is! Reshelving partyyyyy
+_getriled … Why do I have a sudden premonition of very little actual work occurring?
anybody out there craving some tasty chicken wings? sometimes it just HITS you! #midnightmunchies
+srowe1822 i heard a rumor about new students???
+_getriled No Comment. You'll have to be a little more oblique than that, Riley.
Any suggestions for a great tea that goes with physics brain-teasers?
+countesslovelace lol I wish I could stay awake with tea, gotta be a cafe mocha... mmm chocolate.
+countesslovelace try some passion-fruit rooibos! That stuff'll get you charged up and ready to think big!
+countesslovelace I'm a fan of mint tea for almost everything. Soothing, but won't put you to sleep.
+countesslovelace Functionally-speaking, tea and coffee are the same - so deca-distilled coffee should help. 3-4 tablespoons can provide hours of heightened energy.
+srowe1822 holy jeebers, I gotta get me some of that, imagine how much STUFF I could get done!!!
+_getriled ... I regret disclosing the existence of this substance.
